name: exquis
description: Exquis users will be able to create skeletons, which are the collaborative art projects to which they can add collaborators. Each collaborator will in turn add bones to the skeleton, over time creating a beautiful, unique, unpredictable outcome.

scripts.build: npm run backend-install && npm run frontend-install && npm run frontend-build

author: Andrea Cano Gisbert, Daphne Lam, Nathan Kwon
